system.description: You have learned to interface with and control mechadendrites, using them as naturally as your own limbs.
system.benefit:
Character is trained in the use of a particular kind of Mechadendrite in much the same way Weapon Training allows the use of weapons.

Groups:

  • Mechadendrite Use (Weapon): Used for any mechadendrite equipped with a melee or ranged weapon and have the appropriate strength to be used in combat.
  • Mechadendrite Use (Utility): Used for more varied mechadendrites, such as Machine Spirit Interfaces, Manipulators, Medicae, Utility, Optical, and so on.

specialAbilities.name: Mechadendrite Training
specialAbilities.description: You can use mechadendrites of the chosen type without penalty. This talent can be taken multiple times for different types.
